      • getPixelsTouching

        public PixelRing getPixelsTouching(PixelRing pixelRing)

      • expandRingOutside

        public PixelRing expandRingOutside(PixelRing innerRing)
        grows a new ring "outside" this. currently developed for nested pixel rings experimental In principle we could determine the outside by sectioning, but here we assume an onion ring structure with innerRingList representing the inside the ouside is simply "not innerRingList" - it need not be whitespace
        Parameters:
        innerRingList -
        Returns:
